Arg1 is SBAR

Arg1 is NP-OBJ
(S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS صرح) (NP-SBJ (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM وزير) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الدفاع))) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الاسرائيلي))) (NP (NOUN_PROP بنيامين) (NOUN_PROP بن) (NOUN_PROP اليعازر))) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN لقناة) (DET+ADJ_NUM الأولى)) (PP (PREP في) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN التلفزيون) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الاسرائيلي))))) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-TPC-1 (PUNC ") (NOUN_PROP+CASE_DEF_ACC حزب) (NOUN_PROP+CASE_DEF_GEN الله) (PUNC ")) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS أظهر) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC تصميماً)) (PP (PREP على) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN تصعيد) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الوضع)) (PP-LOC (PREP على) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الحدود) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الشمالية))))))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: an insistance on escalating the situation in the northern border
